headline: Pinterest Appoints Kecia Steelman to Board of Directors
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, February 09, 2026--Pinterest, Inc. (NYSE: PINS) today announced that Kecia Steelman, President and Chief Executive Officer of Ulta Beauty, has been appointed to the company’s Board of Directors, effective February 16, 2026.

raw.headline: Pinterest Appoints Kecia Steelman to Board of Directors

headline: Is Ulta’s Inclusive Hairtech Push With Wavytalk Quietly Reshaping Its Competitive Edge (ULTA)?
summary: Wavytalk announced its official debut on Ulta.com on February 4, 2026, adding six professional-inspired styling tools and haircare products to Ulta Beauty’s online assortment, while being expanded its inclusive haircare reach in the U.S. through Target after already entering Ulta Beauty, Amazon, and CVS with varying assortments. Together, these partnerships underline Ulta Beauty’s emphasis on innovative styling technology and inclusive haircare, aiming to broaden its appeal across diverse...

headline: Ulta Beauty taps women athletes for marketing push
summary: The retailer teamed up with six athletes for its Ulta Beauty Roster as a way to show the “transformative power of both sport and beauty.”
